items.sentence: I looked for Tom and Mary for more than an hour.
I just gave Tom a drink about three minutes ago.
Tom wanted to live in a French-speaking country.
Tom wanted to prove to Mary that he could do it.
Tom wants me to give him everything that I have.
Tom was about thirty years old when he met Mary.
Tom was about to go out when it started to rain.
I might be able to convince Tom to dance for us.
I need a volunteer to help Tom clean the garage.
I need to ask Tom about how to get to his house.
